content:
Faden family

1 Michael Salomon FADEN              1788-92 - 1846 #44
 + Sara                              1796-99 - 1845 #167 (Moyzes)
  2o Jenta Leia FADEN                1815 - 1819 #212
  2x Salomon Lebel FADEN             1818 #251 - before 1882
    + Cyrel GOLDSTEIN                c1827 - before 1882
     3o Roza FADEN                   May 18, 1845 #338 - 1847 #378
     3o Sara Haia FADEN              Dec 12, 1847 #470 - 1847 #765
     3x Michal Wolf FADEN            Apr 3, 1850 #139
       + Rachel STOCK                Dec 28, 1847 (1848 #11)
             married May 5, 1889 #48
        4o Cyrel FADEN               Oct 29, 1873 (1874 #85)
          * Mozes Aron LIEBGOLD      Apr 1, 1874 #214
                married Apr 29, 1900 #48
              FAMILY LISTING
     3o Sara FADEN                   Aug 22, 1853 (1858 #1477)
       * Samuel GOLDBERGER           Bochnia
        4x Salomon Leib GOLDBERGER   Jun 16, 1882 #327 - Jul 9, 1882 #265
     3x Eber FADEN                   Dec 30, 1856 #741
  2o Rywka FADEN                     1824 #405 - 1824 #238
  2o Szyfra FADEN                    1828 #76
  2x son FADEN                       1832 #357 - 1832 #343
  2x Chaim Izaak FADEN               1836 #421 - 1880-90
    + Rachel BIRNBAUM                May 29, 1838 #232
          married Jul 13, 1863 (1865 #5)
     3x Lipman (Leopold Jozef Marjan) FADEN   Jul 1, 1864 (1865 #18)
       + Wanda 
       + Eleonora Jozefa             Feb 17, 1886 Skrzydlna
             married Feb 2, 1908 Zakopane
     3x Michael FADEN                Aug 1, 1865 #619
     3o Sara FADEN                   Feb 3, 1867 #217
       * Juliusz Ludwik KUP          Nov 1865 Szegedin
             married Feb 4, 1890 #19
     3o Hendel FADEN                 1869 #254 - Jun 7, 1869 #221
     3x Salomon FADEN                Jun 9, 1870 #414 - after 1891 NJ
     3x Moses FADEN                  Jun 13, 1872 - Jun 23, 1872 #247
     3o Chaja (Helena) FADEN         Jul 15, 1873 #581
       * Alfred PADAWER              Feb 1882 kolonia nad Renem
             married Jun 23, 1906 #112
     3o Jetta (Jadwiga) FADEN        Nov 28, 1875 (1876 #77) - after 1941
       * Henryk RIMLER               Sep 24, 1863 #427 - 1924
             married Jan 15, 1893 #53
        4x Karol RIMLER              Jul 22, 1897 #458
          + Irena Maria BRODZKA      Oct 21, 1901 Lodz (Helena Panska + Leon Grzegorz)
                married Oct 23, 1920 Lodz
           5x Jerzy Aleksander RIMLER-BRODZKI  Dec 5, 1921 Lodz - Oct 14, 1981 Warsaw
                famous journalist
          + Kamila KROLIKOWSKA    Feb 10, 1908 Lodz (Izabela+Grzegorz)
                married Mar 27, 1930 Lodz
           5o Krystyna RIMLER        1931 Lodz
           5x Karol RIMLER           1933 Lodz
          + Mable 
                married after 1945 England
        4o Ida (Teresa Ida Maria) RIMLER  Jan 16, 1900 #20 - after 1941
          * Mojzesz Jozef FUSSMAN    Nov 15, 1885 #674 - Apr 10, 1935 Krakow
                married Prog.Syn Dec 19, 1920 #542
              FAMILY LISTING
          * Feliks BORNSTEIN 
        4x Jan Henryk RIMLER         Jun 1, 1908 #562 - after 1941
          + Olimpia SZAJDAKOWSKA     Jul 10, 1912
                married Dec 28, 1935
           5x Jan RIMLER             Oct 9, 1936
     3x Emanuel FADEN                Oct 15, 1879 #806
